data.title: Jamal Crawford stats
data.meta_description: Jamal Crawford profile player page. Season shootmap, deep stats, history data and more.
data.text:
Jamal Crawford is 44 years old (Mar 20, 1980), 196 cm tall and plays for Brooklyn Nets.

Jamal Crawford jersey number is 1.

Jamal Crawford statistics are available during live games and after every game played.

Sofascore covers in detail all basketball stats such as:

Points, assists, rebounds, steals and other important statistics

Seasonal shootmaps with in-depth overview of shooting averages and positions

Overview of former and current teams of the player

Jamal Crawford previous game for Brooklyn Nets was Milwaukee Bucks - Brooklyn Nets in NBA and the game ended with the result 116 - 119.
